column1: Waterborne transport within the United Kingdom, 2001 - 2011
1. The 'All traffic' figures in table 1(a) for all years and in table 1(b) from 2000 onwards are calculated by the addition of the totals for coastwise traffic and
one-port traffic together with the internal and foreign components of inland waters traffic. See Technical Notes for more details.
